class.desc: An enum for specifying which direction in the file to read.

constant.name: DIRECTION_FIXED
constant.desc: Means that a read is intended for a spot in a stream.

constant.name: DIRECTION_FORWARD
constant.desc: Means that a read is intended for going in increasing position from a spot in the stream.

constant.name: DIRECTION_BACKWARD
constant.desc: Means that a read is intended for going in decreasing position from a spot in a stream.
